util

Class XMLBuilderRunner

  • Object
    • XMLBuilderRunner

  • public class XMLBuilderRunner
extends Object
    This class was used to create the initial Theme XML files for default themes included in MV-CoDA i.e.: it describes each GFXElement in the three included themes
    Author:
    Tony

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private String author
      Name of the element's author.
      private Path rootDir
      RootDir is held by theme and we grab it from there
      private Path themeDir
      this is the changable directory for the theme being generated
      private String version
      Text representing the element's version.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XMLBuilderRunner() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void main(String[] args)
      When run, will generate the three default MV-CoDA themes in the default Themes directory
      private void makeClassicTheme()
      Creates the variables for each element in this theme and gives the theme a name
      private void makePopTheme()
      Creates the variables for each element in this theme and gives the theme a name
      private void makeUrbanTheme()
      Creates the variables for each element in this theme and gives the theme a name
      private void run()
      Serialises the information in this class to xml files for each theme setup
      private void writeThemeXML(Theme theme)
      Serialises a theme and writes to disk at the root directory in a folder named after the theme

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • rootDir

        private Path rootDir
        RootDir is held by theme and we grab it from there

      • themeDir

        private Path themeDir
        this is the changable directory for the theme being generated

      • author

        private String author
        Name of the element's author. These variables will be constant to all the XML's that are being created for MV-CoDA version 1.0 so are fields here

      • version

        private String version
        Text representing the element's version. These variables will be constant to all the XML's that are being created for MV-CoDA version 1.0 so are fields here
